item.title: March Build Update
item.description: A March build update A door, some floor progress and general reflections. Table Of Contents What we’ve done Highlights What’s next? What we’ve done Hello from The Miette HQ! The last half of February and March has been a busy and productive month for Erny and Lys, and thanks to an unseasonably dry month on the coast we have made some great progress on the tiny. We kicked off the month by refurbishing our 40-year-old door.
